title: [FEATURE] Native Kimi provider - Anthropic Messages API

logs.msg: Use Anthropic Messages API directly like pi does, instead of OpenRouter's OpenAI completions. This fixes the 'Invalid request' errors with Kimi k2.5. Reference: https://kimi.com/code/en
CORRECTION: Kimi API is OpenAI-compatible, NOT Anthropic. api.moonshot.ai uses /v1/chat/completions format. Implementation uses LlmClient::openai_compatible() which is correct.

Implementation verified against liteLLM docs (docs.litellm.ai/docs/providers/moonshot): Base URL api.moonshot.ai/v1, OpenAI-compatible /chat/completions, env vars MOONSHOT_API_KEY. Code matches. Needs user testing with actual account.
